website_summaries.verdict: Two years in, the PlayStation Vita has come of age and become a refined piece of hardware and an excellent place to play a lot of games. You don't need one, but it's really fun and worth its price.
pros: The new Vita Slim charges with any Micro-USB cable, is thinner and lighter, has improved battery life, and works nicely as a PS4 accessory for local game streaming
The game library's gotten really good, too, including freebies for PS Plus subscribers
cons: Expensive proprietary memory cards are necessary and annoying
new LCD display is less vivid than the original Vita's OLED display
the lack of rumble and extra buttons means some remote-play PS4 games translate awkwardly

customer_reviews.title: VITA is life, Pack-In is disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Vita: 5 Stars Memory Card: 1 Star Borderlands 2 port: Freaking awful I love the Vita dearly. I picked a bundle, because why not, but the B2 port for this system was pretty bad. The worst thing is the choppy animation and lack of animation. Things happen but you can't see them because the models just lack keyframes for any kind of feedback. Same with projectiles, most are missing or choppy. No lighting either. It makes for a frustrating and uncomfortable experience. I'm a Borderlands veteran and know this game thru and thru, but this is bad. The Nvidia Shield version makes a much better effort. Too bad, this could have been so much better coded.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good, but with some cons
customer_reviews.text: Needed this as a replacement for my older Vita, which I handed down to my sister. While I appreciate that this newer Vita actually has a universal USB charging port, rather than that proprietary crap from before. It's also slimmer and overall nicer than the original model, but, the new screen is nowhere near the quality of the original. It still looks very nice, but the colors are dulled and don't pop near as much as they did on the original model. Still, overall, it's a great little product and the extended battery life is certainly a plus.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this psvita as a backup for my current one. The psvita-2000 I ordered from this seller was as described but it was a little dusty as it wasn’t in a cover in the box and must have been in storage for awhile. After I wiped the dust off, the system is clean and has almost no cosmetic issues. It appears to be in like-new condition. I should also note I had to charge it out of the box before I could make sure it works. Everything appears to work, it connects to the internet and loads games fine. I’m satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Gillaspie

customer_reviews.title: Borderlands for Vita has Bugs- play it on a different platform
customer_reviews.text: Borderlands 2 is my favorite game- but there were bugs in the Vita version they never bothered to repair. If you want to play as Zero the Assassin his skill is completely broken - in a bad way. When you activate his skill, not only do you become invisible- but so do ALL OF THE ENEMIES- thus rendering it useless for killing sprees. The console itself is great. Granted it flopped so there aren't really new games being added- but it still plays well. Borderlands 2 is still a fantastic game- this version just has some super annoying bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Slyfive

customer_reviews.title: Why haven't you bought one yet?
customer_reviews.text: If you are still on the fence about a Vita, now is the time to jump in. The price is finally right for most budgets, and the game library is huge now that you have 4 years worth of backlog games to play (as of 2016). Great graphics, fun games, and intuitive controls. And on top of that, for those with a PS4, the remote play is amazing. Especially if you pick up a 3rd party case that turns the back touchscreen into the L2/R2 shoulder buttons. This pack is a great starting point, and totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bendimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the Vita and memory card bundle. Don't buy it for Borderlands 2 though, this game is not that good on the Vita.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. I love having the Vita as a dad with a 4 month old. This allows me to play some games in bed at night after the baby has gone down to sleep. This is a good deal for the Vita and an 8GB flash card, Borderlands 2 is not the best game to get with the Vita though. It does not show off the systems capabilities well aside from the fact that it's amazing that it plays on a handheld at all. I would recommend picking up another game but the bundle is still a deal for the handheld and memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Brock W. Volio

customer_reviews.title: and I thought it was garbage, because you couldn't remote play like they said
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these when there was just PS3, and I thought it was garbage, because you couldn't remote play like they said. With the PS4, and PS Now this thing is great. With the addon of the r2 l2 buttons it works great. I had the o led one, which every one told me looked better, but the newer one has a better screen. The old one has black splashes through the screen when it gets dark, which is something to do with oled. The slim PS VITA is was better than the older one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good packing. Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good packing. Good product. For the people who want the firmware version. It came with 3.35 Also, the voucher worked well for me. Mine was to expire on March 31st 2017. Btw, the product seems from Canada, since it has a french manual instead of spanish one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Playstation Vita working like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Hey, I just got my Playstation Vita and I am already loving it. I had no idea it would be this much fun to use. The whole thing is just so amazing. I mean I had a PlayStation console as a child but man I'm glad I bought this handheld console. it's got me back onto PlayStation as I had been before.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceMonkey27Sirmud

customer_reviews.title: BEST PLAYSTATION VITA!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this for one year four months. I am tell you honest this is best PlayStation Vita I ever play and you can traveling with it everywhere. It have pretty good battery and it is kinda like PS3 & PS4 way you play on controller. Borderlands 2 is kinda bored and kinda to hard use on controller, but if you are fan of borderlands, then this will be great for you play with it. Hope you will choose this best PS Vita!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great portable gaming console.
customer_reviews.text: The PS Vita Slim is great. I've wanted it for a while; the $169 Borderlands 2 bundle promotion was irresistible. The hardware works great, having a real controls to play many games is a vastly improved experience over gaming on a tablet with virtual controls. The Vita's LCD display is crisp. The unit is light, easy to carry and hold and the new features, like charging via a micro USB connector are useful. The newer releases for this console are solid. Mercenary Killzone looks and plays like a legitimate console game. Borderlands 2 is OK. Resogun (released yesterday, 12/23) is outstanding. Many other games, especially indie titles, exclusive to Vita, are great, too.
customer_reviews.author: DavidByres

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Borderlands 2 is an ok game so far. Wish the graphics were better but, it's a handheld game unit. Psp vita is the newer one and is remarkably light and sleek. I had a psp when it first came out ages ago aging am really impressed with the advancement of Sony's development on this unit. Boxing is nice and we'll put together. My code worked perfectly for Borderlands 2 and said it would expire in 2017. So, from other reviews here informing other amazonians that their code was expired seems like a bad batch. I'd highly recommend this to any avid gamer and enthusiast. Also, do yourself a favor and get kill zone.
customer_reviews.author: adam evans

customer_reviews.title: It's PERFECT for all the indie games on PSN
customer_reviews.text: It's true the screen is not an OLED on this new version of VITA, but that does not stop me from enjoying the hell out of this thing. It's PERFECT for all the indie games on PSN, and has made plane trips much more tolerable. The remote play is awesome too, although I use it in the house, not in hotels or anything. It's doubtful you'll get internet speeds high enough in a hotel to take advantage of the remote play over internet. I have big hands, and it's true the buttons are small, but I manage to make it work OK. Battery life is impressive too. At least 8 hours heavy use on one charge!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: This bundle is good as a deal
customer_reviews.text: This bundle is good as a deal. However about the unit itself. I was excited to have a psp with two joysticks and more playing options as i already own a psp3000. The size is taller up and down. I don't have small hands but because of the extra stretch and thin design you find the area between thumb and forefinger in pain that I never felt from the psp 3000 size. Just an fyi. I also liked the more desktop computer style of interface that the psp had rather than a touch screen apps like screen. Its like using a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Big kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We already had two of these before we got this one, so we knew we loved it. We like being able to invite our kids to our game or that we can play and be occupied seperately. The code for Borderlands 2 was expired, but still worked. I love being able to play my games, or surf the web, or netflix, or send messages to my friends. And it's all in HD! Having started my gaming adventure with the Gameboy color handheld, my inner child is more than happy with the PS Vita evolution.
customer_reviews.author: Brambalam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming system
customer_reviews.text: Got my boyfriend a PS Vita for Christmas, and he has been very impressed with it. Amazing graphics, fantastic selection of games. The thing that stuck out to me personally as unique, is the fact that there are touchscreen controls on the back of the console so that you can tap/swipe to attack, etc. on a game. We will be experimenting to find the ways we can connect this system with our PS3 and PS4 (can you tell we love play station network?) Much more impressive than my 3DS, I would switch myself over if PS Vita had the pokemon games :o)
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: I saw a lot of bad reviews because of the expired code
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not for the borderlands game but for the memory card. I saw a lot of bad reviews because of the expired code. Right now you can buy this or a ps vita by itself for the same price without a memory card and pay 20+ extra to get one. This came in unharmed and works fine. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Sheremetova

customer_reviews.title: Great but test first!
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get this! I seen many friends try them in past and seem really good! Downside for me, I think I got a defective one. Happens, so i return it. Didn't redeem product key (make sure you test before you do) so shouldn't be issue with return. My Vita was taking forever to load up after charged fully. Several several minutes. Not normal and even took it in and asked people about it (Gamestop, Bestbuy, ect). Overall these systems are great but every so often it happens like in everything, a dude occurs. Good luck and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Lives4trauma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! The game is hard to play compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! The game is hard to play compared to the ps3 and ps4 version due to the smaller screen, but it's just like the console version. The vita itself is far better than the psp, and the remote play rules. The only downside is that the packaging has a bitter smell. Lol! Other than that, great price and great bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Pinkstock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion to a PS3 and/or PS4
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the vita for a number years but all of my concerns were put to rest. I should have gotten this sooner. All of the cross-buy make this a great companion to my PS3 and PS4. Originally I got this just to play Steamworld Heist on the go but the Borderlands is superb as well. Highly recommend. Memory sticks are getting hard to find plus are expensive but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Alam

customer_reviews.title: Great portable system
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun handheld system, I primarily use it for remote play with ps4 because I don't have very much interest in the majority of the Japanese games for vita. I am happy with my decision on the slim because I can use the cell phone charger to charge the system, and I always have one of those on me. My friend has an oled launch model and it is definitely noticably brighter than the slims lcd screen but I am still happy with the connector type and ergonomics of my slim model.
customer_reviews.author: Oneeyebear

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely looked brand new ,works perfectly ,very happy as this was a gift and they loved it !!!
customer_reviews.author: jerry campbell

customer_reviews.title: I really like the game play and graphics
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this system due to my past experiences with mobile gaming, but this has exceeded my expectations. I really like the game play and graphics, but my favorite thing is being able to use remote play to play any of my ps4 games in real time. The graphics using remote play look just like I was playing on my tv. Also, the rear touch pads (R2, L2) aren't as difficult to use as I figured they would be. I got used to them very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: A good reimagining of a great system.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: The system UI is dated, and Borderlands 2 is a poor port of a great game. Rear touchpad controls are dumb. I wish Sony would have improved the mushy triggers, but thats only an issue in FPS games. Pros: A great selection of indie titles, and a few triple-A gems. Online features are superior to the offerings of other handhelds (voice chat, trophies, etc). Lighter, and thinner than its previous model with far better battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Weltchek

customer_reviews.title: Great game system
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Still works great and he brings it everywhere. I bought this almost five years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Great Bundle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bundle for the PS Vita. It comes with the newer, slimmed down version of the PS Vita. One of the big perks is that it includes a memory card so you don't need to go out and buy one and can start playing as soon as it arrives. Borderlands 2 is a great game on Vita (and PS3) and the graphics are absolutely stunning for a handheld. The Vita is a great system, it has a wide array of games and a number of applications, including music, web browsing, messaging, and YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: SPC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system well worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and works beautifully. The PS Vita is an awesome system and a huge step up from the PSP, regardless of the somewhat limited selection of games out for the vita right now. I still love the titles that have been released for the vita, the only problem is the number of titles out right now. I am loving the system so much that I even bought another one for my brother for us to play some games together.
customer_reviews.author: SaeDus

customer_reviews.title: It Is Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: It is slim and lighter than the original. The battery life is lasts slightly longer than the original. And, yes it came with everything it says it does! And it arrived in perfect condition. I will say that the only thing I would get is a memory stick because 8 gigabytes won't cut it. Other than that, this is an awesome deal and buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No copy of game!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was a little disappointed when I got this, as I was expecting there to be a physical copy of the game, but instead there is only a code to redeem and download Borderlands 2. Not a big deal, definitely not a deal breaker, but still a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Expired voucher no borderlands
customer_reviews.text: I mean the ps vita works, however if your buying this to get borderlands 2 DON'T the cod I received expired 03/31/17 so about a month ago. I'm giving it a 3 stars because the ps vita works fine, just no borderlands.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little machine and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I treated myself to the Vita Slim. It's a great little machine and very easy to use. I haven't played Borderlands yet. What I have played I really enjoyed. The only trouble I had was that I couldn't make my own acct. on the Playstation Store. I don't know why it wouldn't let me so I used my husbands acct. and it works just fine. Wish they came in different colors but that's just me being a girl.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Used "Acceptable Condition" from Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Bought an "acceptable Condition" one from the amazon warehouse. Came in really good condition. Little to no scratches, was just covered in fingerprints. The Vita was repackaged and arrived without the borderlands code and without a charger, but it did have the 8gb memory card. I was a tad upset that it came without a charger, but it wasn't too big of an issue since the chargers go for about 10 dollars and the Vita 2000 model can be charged via usb.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be a joke considering how few ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a joke considering how few quality games there seems to be out there. I already own a 3ds so I figured this would just be my fall back system. I've bought almost every game available for this system.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Was supposed to be a borderlands 2 bundle but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a borderlands 2 bundle but it didn't even come with the game it only came with the vita. Really unhappy and and so is my son.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Just a scare, Coupon works!
customer_reviews.text: When I got the system the coupon for the game was expired! I was pissed, I paid $200. For a system with game so my son could play it when he opened it for Christmas. I typed in the code and it went through. And my Husband love it too. He's planning on getting himself one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Re-Vita-lizing my childhood games.
customer_reviews.text: This was worth the money. I can experience my fav old PSOne games again and I learned to love Borderlands. I'm exceptionally happy about this purchase. My only complaint is that I wished I used this more, but it's certainly easier than playing Ps2 on the television. Also buy the screen protector especially if you have a dog and are a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Demaree

customer_reviews.title: so it was a waste. Save your money and just buy the PS ...
customer_reviews.text: The code included expired a long time ago, so there was zero reason to buy this bundled version. I couldn't use the game, so it was a waste. Save your money and just buy the PS Vita by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Bulla

customer_reviews.title: Borderlands 2 is pretty sluggish on the Vita and doesn't make a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a memory card and a code to redeem Borderlands 2. Borderlands 2 is pretty sluggish on the Vita and doesn't make a good impression of what the system is capable of.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: though I feel like my right joystick is failing not sure if its ...
customer_reviews.text: Im still using this ps vita, though I feel like my right joystick is failing not sure if its because of use or it came like that. I would still buy this offer again if I was going to change it though I would have to check ps vita price again but last time I check it was the best offer.
customer_reviews.author: kytomlin

customer_reviews.title: Ps Vita 2000 series, graphics are incredibly !!
customer_reviews.text: I really have been enjoying my purchase. The ps vita is the best hand game system for every type of gamer. The new and improved design is excellent, and the all the additional items (memory card, game, dlc's you get with this purchase is great as well. The selection of games, the quality of the graphics, the versatility of apps makes this system the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: marco bustos

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Never played the borderlands series. Pretty good game. After haveing this for some time now it worked great connecting to my ps4 even from another state. After the most recent update i cant even connect to my ps4 through my own home wifi.
customer_reviews.author: mr. k

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: It has been months since I bought my Vita and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I do not necessarily care for Borderlands, because the controls are a headache (ps3 version is way better). But games such as Gravity Rush, SAO: Hollow Fragment, Senran Kagura, Conception 2, Freedom Wars and so much more have justified the purchase alone! Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: PossM

customer_reviews.title: Slimmed down for your benefit
customer_reviews.text: The game was amazing, the system is perfect, never a single issue with it. It weighs so little, and easy to hold.. Saying this, I must insist you buy thegripper. It will help prevent hand cramping!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lightning08

customer_reviews.title: WAY BETTER THAN THE OG ONE
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very fast shipping! I would recommend this one way more than the old vita, the ot problem is that the borderlands game takes up all the space on the 8GB memory card so I ended up deleting it, but I can still re download it for free. Also you should check out this game called The Binding Of Isaac, I used to play it on the computer but it's way better on the vita, it's $15 tho. Just don't get that game if you are VERY religious, I'm religious but I don't mind the jokes. MUST HAVE PRODUCT!!!! PEACE OUT FROM YA BOY SKEMPA
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Love the vita like I loved the PSP. Yes it could use some more exclusives but it's still a great strong portable gaming machine. Being able to play tons of PS1 and PSP games is also a huge bonus. Definitely recommended. Just make sure you get a large capacity memory stick.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nasar

customer_reviews.title: good performance. awesome graphics, good battey life
customer_reviews.text: must have for gaming fans. deducting one star because of limited game library. (though its backward compatible but there are truly only a few game which are capable to utilizing the hardware and touch functionality offered by this device) I tried FIFA 15, NFS, killzone, hot shot golf, uncharted (PS VITA version).. and they all look superb.
customer_reviews.author: Kan

customer_reviews.title: Vita is Great! Storage not so Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Vita, but I hate that the storage is so expensive. The Vita itself is amazing. The controls are easy to use, it feels great in my hands. The touch screen works smoothly. The storage though. I don't find myself using it that often, because of the storage problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Persaud

customer_reviews.title: nice device.
customer_reviews.text: my son wanted it for Christmas, it was delivered on time, and there was no damage to anything. The game that came with it was not a physical game, but a download code to put the game into your device. It loaded without any trouble and it has built in wifi so he can go online. nice device..........
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ps vita bundle because I wanted to play Borderlands 2. I also bought it because it was somewhat cheep considering the price and all the things that are included. The game is downloadable and not a hard copy in case anyone was wondering. It also takes up nearly 6 gigs so if you are planning on downloading games on to the system, I strongly suggest you also buy a bigger memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good Software, Bad Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Software is great, but the physical design is poor. The setup is not very ergonomic for using the game after a short period. This is especially true if you are doing a lot of front- or back-tapping of the screen (such as with the included game). Additionally, the placement of the power and audio jacks is on the bottom, further restricting how you can hold the game. These would be much better coming out of the top.
customer_reviews.author: gyakusetsu

customer_reviews.title: Digital-version
customer_reviews.text: The game's fun, but it crashes very often after a couple of days of gameplay. I would recommend purchasing the non-digital version.
customer_reviews.author: Wilberth

customer_reviews.title: Well...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when it arrived a day early. I redeemed the code to Borderlands 2 and immediately started playing when it finished downloading everything. I love the fact that you can go on Netflix, Facebook and it even has a front and back camera. I'm used to playing borderlands on console so the game on the PS Vita was a bit complicated at first. But I got the hang of everything. I can't wait to buy more games for this. Perfect for traveling or just passing the time. You should definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Morillo

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: I installed it prior to giving it to my nephew. I love the graphics and when my nephew received it as a graduation gift, he got so excited and happy. He loves it to the extent that he doesn't want to be disturbed.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: As Advertised. Borderlands 2 claim slip says it expired 5/6/16 but I was still able to activate it. Just a heads up that some day you may not be able too.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Game is better than the system
customer_reviews.text: The vita is great, and has so much potential. Sony just doesn't do anything with it. Borderlands however is fantastic, and remains fantastic on the vita. If you have a PS4, the vita is a much better buy because of the remote play option.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Expired redeemable code for borderlands
customer_reviews.text: Code to redeem the borderlands 2 game is expired. Shameful to sell these knowing the game codes are expired. So much for the included game.
customer_reviews.author: s d

customer_reviews.title: love the console.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Vita and the Slim is amazing. The Borderlands game that comes with it isn't that great on the vita, it's just a bad port to be honest. But Other than that the Vita is still good and their of plenty of great games made for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R

customer_reviews.title: More reasons to play video games!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! It's a PS Vita Slim model. It comes with the Borderlands 2 game and 6 DLCs, an 8gb memory card, and the needed cables. I would suggest getting another memory card as the game and DLCs take up a lot of space on the provided card. I recently purchased a 32gb one for all my other games and plan on reserving the 8gb for BL2 alone. Everything is working so far and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nilly

customer_reviews.title: Great console
customer_reviews.text: It is a good console, lighter, thinner, battery has more life, the screen is almost no difference with the previous model, is a good option if someone does not have a ps vita but want to own one, also comes with a free game that is this tremendous Borderlands2
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: The PS Vita is a great handheld system and Borderlands 2 is a great game ...
customer_reviews.text: The PS Vita is a great handheld system and Borderlands 2 is a great game for said system. I would recommend getting a large memory card and investing in Sony's Playstation Plus service to get the full benefits this system has to offer, not to mention free games every month!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: ... back on seemed to fix the problem but yea good game too came with 6 dlc for free and ...
customer_reviews.text: awsome gaming system for the go only problem i had was the touch screen would be unresponsive at times but putting into sleep and turning it back on seemed to fix the problem but yea good game too came with 6 dlc for free and 8 gb memory card all for 169.99 really cheap
customer_reviews.author: Miguel pulido

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for vita purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's much cheaper to pay for this than to purchase a vita and memory card separately. Borderlands 2 doesn't play all that well on vita, but that's not why I purchased this bundle. Definitely choose this over vita by itself!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for the vita. Not for the game
customer_reviews.text: Buy this because it is cheap. Do not buy it because it comes with Borderlands 2. You will be disappointed. The game does not run nearly as well on vita as you would expect. It is often laggy (~15-20fps) and the controls make it difficult to play solo (with 3/6 classes). Multiplayer is more fun however vita only allows for 2 player multiplayer. What is awesome is the cross play compatibility for ps3.
customer_reviews.author: Niren N

customer_reviews.title: Great Bundle
customer_reviews.text: The bundle worked out nicely, getting the vita and a game right off the bat. It has worked nicely being able to take it to work to use on breaks and use it at home to connect to my ps4 while someone is watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: GOT IT FOR $135
customer_reviews.text: GO AMAZON WHEREHOUSE DEALS. IT was untouched and basically just had a gash in the box. Item was brand new, game code was still unused, memory card to boot too! All for $135 prime shipping. So GOOOOD
customer_reviews.author: intimacygel

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun! I had a psp before and I loved it so I got this.. I didn't even do any research on it which is rare for me especially with such an expensive purchase.. but I wasn't disappointed. I love it! It came with a memory card. I just wish the memory card was of a larger capacity!
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: The bundle is great. While the memory card might not be enough ...
customer_reviews.text: The bundle is great. While the memory card might not be enough for both borderlands and other games, it should suffice for others not looking into downloading a lot. The system is good, but I won't get it unless their are at least a few games your interested in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Portable Power House
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting it off for awhile but the ability to play loads of my favorite Japanese RPG's on my American console is great! Awesome Battery life solid build quality and a bright colorful screen.
customer_reviews.author: RooeeZe

customer_reviews.title: Good bundle for good price.
customer_reviews.text: The bundle is great, the vita is nice and the code worked even though it said it was expired. It's actually cheaper to buy it this way then alone (at least on Amazon) and you get a game too so it's all good
customer_reviews.author: psychokittyd

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. Love it's features also free to play ...
customer_reviews.text: My first PSP vita. I absolutely love it. Love it's features also free to play online. It makes traveling on bus fast. I use it at work on down time lol.
customer_reviews.author: Zepeda,F

customer_reviews.title: buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome console. Awesome deal! If your looking to buy a Playstation vita this is the way to go. I highly recommend this item. You get a 8g memory stick (borderlands 2 goes on it and take up about 6gs) borderlands 2 all for 200! You can't go wrong with the deal. Amazon messed up when they sent me this iteam. They sent me the wrong iteam. But they sent me a new one and 1 day later I got it! Other then that I'm very pleased with this ps vita !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome handheld, probably under appreciated
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun in a box. Borderlands 2 is a great game and the console is at the right price point. My wife and I play adhoc network games together and these are great for taking places.
customer_reviews.author: Trev Or

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal and love the Vita and many of ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good deal and love the Vita and many of it's games. I enjoy having the handheld for on-the-go gaming and will be purchasing a Playstation TV to play some of it's games on the big screen for when I'm sitting at home.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle for the Vita console system
customer_reviews.text: Great console system that includes entertaining game and memory card. This is a good value package that includes a small memory card and the Borderlands game. The Vita is a modern system that has more adult titles than the DS that I have used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Thriftygeek

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT on every detail
customer_reviews.text: Sony did it again great product amazing battery life, not regrets at all this version is awesome, comfortable, it is just perfect great quality if you don't have this model what are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great package!
customer_reviews.text: the Vita is a nice toy, and Borderlands 2 is a great game (for grownups...). Glad I got the bundle. Plays pretty close to the PC version with a controller. Surprised at how well the Vita handles it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: The LCD screen looks bad when compared side-by-side to the OLED of the original, but alone it looks amazing. Its thin and light, has great battery life and comes with a free game. Whats not to love?
customer_reviews.author: civilpaw

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I can not make the change the code, residue in Venezuela, that can help me?
customer_reviews.author: acruces

customer_reviews.title: Game needs to be physical and updates virtual
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The memory card to give you is not enough room for the downloadable content which makes it kind of silly. You can only download the game and the patches if you don't put anything else on your PS Vita. If the game would have been physical and updates virtual it would've been better
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Psvita
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on this almost exactly as advertised, let me explain. The vita was in great condition plus it was completely covered in Kevlar. It had the borderlands 2 download still available to download, but as advertised it did not have the other games downloaded. All in all I am still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Borderlands voucher code doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Love the system. I would have given it a 5, but my Borderlands 2 voucher code doesn't work. More than likely someone has already used it even though this is supposed to be a new system and the code doesn't exprire until 2016. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jello

customer_reviews.title: I had the first PS Vita model with the OLED screen and I really enjoy it, but the battery drain very fast when ...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought about this one, I had the first PS Vita model with the OLED screen and I really enjoy it, but the battery drain very fast when gaming because of the OLED screen. I don't regret upgrading to this one, battery life is significantly better and I don't miss the OLED screen. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Contomatillo

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PORTABLE GAMER DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this device. it's portable, easy charge with the micro usb port. The PS VITA gives you the experience of a console in a small portable device :))) too bad the memory card that comes with it if you installed borderlands 2 it will be full :( Otherwise the device is awesome with awesome choices in the store, specially the Playstation plus membership gives you a lot of choices for 1 price for subscription
customer_reviews.author: Omar Bukhari

customer_reviews.title: Great system, few downfalls
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today and am pleased with the value. However, Borderlands 2 takes up roughly 5GB of memory which doesn't leave you with much. Also, being a huge fan of BL2 I can tell you that the controls for this system are extremely difficult to adjust to. I find myself dying constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kjos

customer_reviews.title: Best bundle for PS Vita.
customer_reviews.text: This is my best purchase of 2014. I already have a 3DS and I can't be must happy with these 2 handhelds. And this bundle is excellent, because comes with a memory card of 8GB, which allow you to play right after you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for Borderlands series but this was still a good purchase at the time since I had not even played the series until I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: great value fun system
customer_reviews.text: i personally do not like the game but when i bought this the price was fantasic and the pvita is over all my fav handheld anything ever the battery life on this thing is un real i played for 11 hrs non stop off 1 full charge im not sure if that is normal as i only own the 1 but you cant knock that. i would suggest a protective screen case however such as this will really help you keep you baby in good shape for many years to come
customer_reviews.author: fox

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids too!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little handheld, bought this for my 6 year old little brother and he loved it. He plays under my account so all those free ps vita games I get monthly with ps plus he can download. The games are usually simple indie games so their perfect for him plus the vita is still getting all the upcoming Lego games which he is crazy about as are most kids these days.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Castrejon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift. Very happy, came on time and works great. What else can you say about this item really. Has some cool functions and my step dad is getting loads of use out of it so good buy :P
customer_reviews.author: moons

customer_reviews.title: I love the vita
customer_reviews.text: I love the vita. Works great with third person games like assassin creed unity. Remote play is brilliant and works great. It looks very good too. You can connect via wifi or internet. Wifi connection works very fast. I suggest you buy the nyko grip or smart clip because it's a bit uncomfortable to hold the vita for extended periods of gaming. Battery life is great as we'll. overall, I happy with it. Note that I bought it used and received a defective unit. The right joystick kept moving the cursor by itself, rotating without me touching it. This made playing any game impossible. Contacted amazon and they helped out immensely. A+ customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't wait to get my hands on this bundle ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to get my hands on this bundle and won't turn back. I only wish that Sony would support it a bit more instead of relying on indies buuuuut that being said I'm grateful to be able to get my hands on all these Indies.
customer_reviews.author: M S Mc Cright

customer_reviews.title: I love the vita system
customer_reviews.text: I love the vita system. the one I ordered was cancelled because of a "pricing error." can't comment on the seller or amazon in this case, but 5 stars for the vita.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: camera's good, front facing camera as well
customer_reviews.text: This arrived promptly and exactly as the seller stated, brand spankin new. However the right speaker doesn't seem to be working. This is indeed a light unit and the UI runs smoothly. camera's good, front facing camera as well. Just that right speaker it's driving me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: STiLLz

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its good! Only little flaw is the screen color, but if you never had the old one then you cant tell. The battery life is awesome on this newer vita as well!
customer_reviews.author: Aguilar Fam

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system for myself and son to play while on trips. Very fun and enjoyable. I like the game quality much more that the DS3D system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... helds with that said this is still a very good companion to my ps4
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan of hand helds with that said this is still a very good companion to my ps4. I did however enjoy some of the games that I played on it. If you are a fan of hand helds and want it to do more than just play games then this is a good fit. If you have a ps4 even better
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Overall Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: The package came in a very timely manner, appeared to be undamaged in any way shape or form, and has been ridiculously fun since I got it :) though personally I think a handheld borderlands was a bad idea lol simply not enough buttons on the vita for it
customer_reviews.author: Sid 3

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very good console, downloaded my game and am enjoying it. I am very satisfied with this product, the wireless is working perfectly and I had no problems going on the PSN store.
customer_reviews.author: Schenelle

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BUNDLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Bundle Came with a 8 gb memory card which was just enough to download Borderlands and DLC. which is awesome will get another memory card for more games but A amazing bundle and worth every penny. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: nice little hand held for Sony fans or rpg lovers ...
customer_reviews.text: nice little hand held for Sony fans or rpg lovers as alot of rpgs are on and coming to this system this year like toukiden kiwami, Atelier Ayesha Plus The Alchemist of Dusk,Citizens of Earth Hyperdimension Neptunia ReBirth 2: Sisters Generation etc cant forget action games Duke Nukem 3D: Megaton Edition and it comes with borderlands 2 download code : )
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

product_meta.title: Borderlands 2 - Limited Edition - PlayStation Vita Bundle
product_meta.description:
View larger BORDERLANDS 2 LIMITED EDITION PLAYSTATION VITA BUNDLE
Include the greatness of PlayStation gaming in your mobile lifestyle with the all-in-one Borderlands 2 Limited Edition PlayStation Vita Bundle. With Dual Analog Sticks for precision control and critically acclaimed co-op you can shoot and loot through the world of Pandora with your friends. This bundle also features the new PlayStation Vita system with the following enhancements:

LIGHTER AND THINNER
View larger Approximately 20 percent slimmer and 15 percent lighter than original.

LONGER BATTERY LIFE
View larger Increased battery life of four to six hours of game play.

CRISP VISUALS WITH LCD SCREEN
View larger High-resolution liquid crystal display (LCD) for vivid visuals.

THE ULTIMATE DIGITAL DEVICE
View larger Over 900 games available for download on the PS Vita through the PS Store including new hits, indie titles, PS one Classics, and PS Mobile games.

REMOTE PLAY
View larger The gaming experience continues even when the TV is not available. With remote play, stream a range of PlayStation titles to the PlayStation Vita system*. This makes the PS Vita system the perfect companion device to the PS4 system.

*Requires sufficiently robust Wi-Fi connection.

PS PLUS ON YOUR PS VITA SYSTEM
View larger As a member of PlayStation Plus discover a world of extraordinary gaming experiences through the ever-expanding collection of great games available for the PS Vita system.

BORDERLANDS 2 FEATURES:
View larger DESIGNED EXCLUSIVELY FOR PS VITA SYSTEM
Enjoy the full Borderlands 2 experience optimized for the PS Vita platform. Shoot your way through Pandora in four-player co-op and easily navigate the maps, inventory, and items using the touchscreen. Continue your adventures at home using the cross-save feature with the PS3 system.

View larger ALL-NEW CHARACTERS AND ALL-NEW CLASSES
Step into the role of six all-new characters and classes, each wildly different from one another with unique skills and abilities. Dual wield rocket launchers with Salvador the Gunzerker. Turn invisible and stab your foes in the back with Zer0 the Assassin. Fire off otherworldly powers as Maya the Siren. Drop machine gun turrets as Axton the Commando. Sick your pet robot on a group of enemies as Gaige the Mechromancer. Bash skulls and set them on fire as Krieg the Psycho.

View larger DYNAMIC CO-OP
Share your adventures with friends by dropping in and out of a campaign session on your PS Vita system without ever having to restart the game. On top of that you can even take your new gear from any game to any other!

View larger WORLD CONNECTED STORY
You will find yourself left for dead in the frozen tundra of Pandora as you begin your quest of revenge and redemption. Expose the evil surrounding the Hyperion Corporation and take on the perpetrator of a universe-wide grand deception -- the nefarious Hyperion CEO, Handsome Jack. (Oh, also: he's stolen credit for the opening of the first Vault.)

View larger NEW BADASS GUN SYSTEM
An entirely new take on the groundbreaking procedural system means millions upon millions of possible weapons. The variety and style of guns in Borderlands 2 is staggering, and you’ll see tons of new and innovative ways to engage foes on Pandora. Fire, electricity, corrosive acid, and much more will all be at your disposal as you fight your way through the Hyperion Corporation’s forces!

View larger BRAND NEW ENEMIES
A whole slew of new enemies are out there to kill you in Borderlands 2. Hulking, gorilla-like Bullymongs, vicious predatory Stalkers and the Hyperion mechanical army, run by Handsome Jack, are just some of the new enemies you will be facing off against on Pandora. New strategies will be needed for every fight, as enemies now interact and aid each other to ensure you don’t get far in the world of Pandora.

BUNDLE FEATURES
View larger  * All-in-one Borderlands 2 Limited Edition PlayStation Vita Bundle includes the new PS Vita Wi-Fi system, Borderlands 2 Full Game Digital Voucher, and 8GB Memory Card.
 * Six (6) Borderlands 2 DLC packs including, Captain Scarlett and her Pirate’s Booty, Mr. Torgue’s Campaign of Carnage, the Psycho Character Class, Mechromancer Character Class, Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 1, and Collector’s Edition Pack.

 * 87 Bazillion...Everything: In addition to the new gun system, you will thirst for procedurally generated shields, grenades, Alien Artifacts, class mods and much, much more. And you thought the original Borderlands had a ton of loot!
 * Brand new environments on Pandora: Hunt through entirely brand new areas of Pandora that are more alive than ever! From the arctic tundra, through the dangerous grasslands, past the mysterious corrosive caverns to beyond, you’ll be surprised by the unpredictable world of Pandora at every turn!
feature_bullets: All-in-one Borderlands 2 Limited Edition PlayStation Vita Bundle includes the new PS Vita Wi-Fi system, Borderlands 2 Full Game Digital Voucher, and 8GB Memory Card

Six (6) Borderlands 2 DLC packs including, Captain Scarlett and her Pirate's Booty, Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage, the Psycho Character Class, Mechromancer Character Class, Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Pack 1, and Collector's Edition Pack

The New PlayStation Vita: Approximately 20 percent slimmer and 15 percent lighter than original, internal memory of 1GB, increased battery life of four to six hours of game play, rounded edges for comfort while playing, high-resolution liquid crystal display (LCD) for vivid and crisp visuals

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars911 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
